TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlImage extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 提供对服务器上 HTML 元素的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access for the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件在网页上显示图像。Use this control to display an image on a Web page. 控件可以通过编程方式进行操作，以更改显示的图像、图像大小和图像相对于其他页面元素的对齐方式。The control can be programmatically manipulated to change the image displayed, the image size, and the alignment of the image relative to other page elements. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在单击时以编程方式修改 控件的属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the properties of an control when an is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Img" 文本字符串。The "img" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化控件的新实例 。The following code example illustrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/CS/htmlimagectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/VB/htmlimagectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像相对于其他网页元素的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

value.span: 字符串，它指定图像相对于其他网页元素的对齐方式。

span.span: A string that specifies the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定图像相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the image with respect to other elements on the Web page. 下表显示了可能的值。The following table represents the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |左侧left|图像在网页的左侧对齐。The image is aligned on the left side of the Web page.| |中心center|图像在网页的中心对齐。The image is aligned in the center of the Web page.| |右right|图像在网页右侧对齐。The image is aligned on the right side of the Web page.| |toptop|网页中的其他元素与图像的上边缘对齐。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the top edge of the image.| |过程middle|网页中的其他元素与图像的中间对齐。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the middle of the image.| |bottombottom|网页中的其他元素与图像的下边缘对齐。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the bottom edge of the image.| > [!NOTE] > 中心值可能不适用于所有浏览器。The center value might not work on all browsers. 若要使图像居中，请在 包含 `align` 属性设置为 `"center"` () 的段落标记内包装控件 `

` 。To center an image, wrap the control inside paragraph tags that contain the `align` attribute set to `"center"` (`

`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定网页上图像的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of an image on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了如何通过在 属性设置为的情况下将控件环绕在段落标记内来使图像居中 `align` `"center"` 。The following code example demonstrates how to center an image on the Web page by wrapping the control inside paragraph tags with the `align` attribute set to `"center"`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Alt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Alt : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在图像不可用或当前正在下载且尚未完成的情况下浏览器显示的替换标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative caption the browser displays if an image is unavailable or currently downloading and not yet finished.

value.span: 字符串，它包含图像不可用时浏览器所使用的替换标题。

span.span: A string that contains the alternative caption for the browser to use when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定在属性指定的图像不可用时显示的标题 。Use this property to specify the caption displayed when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 在较新的浏览器中，此标题还显示为工具提示。On newer browsers, this caption also appears as a ToolTip. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在属性指定的图像不可用时要显示的标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display when the image specified by the property is unavailable. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Border : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像框的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a frame for an image.

value.span: 图像框的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of a frame for an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性创建一个帧，该框架具有指定的宽度 (（以像素为单位）) 图像。Use this property to create a frame with the specified width (in pixels) for an image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件指定宽度为5个像素的帧 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a frame with a width of 5 pixels for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Height : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性可以用两种方式使用。The and properties can be used two ways. 您可以使用 和 属性将图像大小规范发送到浏览器。You can use the and properties to send image size specifications to the browser. 这会更快地显示网页，因为浏览器不需要在图像加载时重新计算页面上的元素位置。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 你还可以使用 和 属性来缩放图像。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 当使用不同于图像物理大小的值时，图像会相应地调整大小。When using values different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 但是，不建议使用此方法缩放图像，因为页面需要更长的时间才能显示。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反，以物理方式将图像大小调整为所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 默认情况下， 属性以像素表示，但也可以表示为窗口大小的百分比。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the size of the window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式修改所显示图像的高度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the height of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流的 。

span.span: The that contains the output stream to render on the client.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该属性的值 是格式不正确的 URL，则该 方法将引发 异常。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, the method throws an exception. 方法重写基类的 方法以写入 `src` 呈现的控件的属性 。The method overrides the base class's method to write the `src` attribute of the rendered control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便始终与控件一起显示特定的可选文本（可作为工具提示进行访问） 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternative text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 属性包含格式不正确的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Src : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的图像文件的源。

span.span: Gets or sets the source of the image file to display.

value.span: 字符串，它包含要显示的图像文件的路径。

span.span: A string that contains the path to an image file to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定要显示的图像文件的路径。Use this property to specify the path to the image file to display. 如果图像文件与使用该文件的网页源文件位于同一个目录中，则可以只指定文件名。If the image file is in the same directory as the Web page source file that uses it, you can just specify the file name. 否则，还必须包含文件的路径。Otherwise, you must also include the path to the file. 路径可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对于包含网页源文件的目录的相对路径。The path can be absolute or relative to the directory that contains the Web page source file. 您可以使用相对路径 " `~/` " 来引用该页面所在的当前虚拟目录。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如， `` "XspTest" 虚拟目录中的页上的的值为 `` 。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定一个图像文件，使其与网页源文件显示在同一个目录中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in the same directory as the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定要在与网页源文件不同的目录中显示的图像文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in a different directory from the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Width : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性可以用两种方式使用。The and properties can be used two ways. 您可以使用 和 属性将图像大小规范发送到浏览器。You can use the and properties to send the image size specifications to the browser. 这会更快地显示网页，因为浏览器不需要在图像加载时重新计算页面上的元素位置。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 你还可以使用 和 属性来缩放图像。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 当使用不同于图像物理大小的值时，将相应地调整图像的大小。When using values that are different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 但是，不建议使用此方法缩放图像，因为页面需要更长的时间才能显示。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反，以物理方式将图像大小调整为所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 默认情况下， 属性以像素表示，但也可以表示为窗口大小的百分比。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the window size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式修改所显示图像的宽度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the width of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
